Detailed Description

This child class of VectorGenerator is used to generate 3D vectors along a line.

The line is specified by its start and end points.

LineVectorGenerator * LineVectorGenerator::parsePythonTuple ( PyObject *  args  )  [static]

This method parses a Python tuple and builds a LineVectorGenerator.

The arguments accepted are two triples of numbers. Args is not a borrowed object so it needs to have its reference count decremented after use.

Parameters:
args Python tuple containing initialisation information.
Returns:
A pointer to the newly created vector generator if successful; NULL, otherwise.
